comments.creator: nrlacasse@hotmail.com
comments.author: nrlacasse@hotmail.com
comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; Win64; x64; rv:11.0a1) Gecko/20111219 Firefox/11.0a1
Build ID: 20111219031209

Steps to reproduce:

I updated 11.0a1 this morning and now Nightly does not start in Sandboxie. I click on the EXE shortcut and it goes directly to the crash reporter. I am unable to submit the crash report though so I coppied the information.


Actual results:

I get the crash reporter right away. This is what it says:

AvailableVirtualMemory: 8795926343680
BuildID: 20111219031209
CrashTime: 1324308187
Email: nrlacasse@hotmail.com
InstallTime: 1324307748
ProductID: {ec8030f7-c20a-464f-9b0e-13a3a9e97384}
ProductName: Firefox
ReleaseChannel: nightly
SecondsSinceLastCrash: 230
StartupTime: 1324308187
SystemMemoryUsePercentage: 28
Throttleable: 1
TotalVirtualMemory: 8796092891136
Vendor: Mozilla
Version: 11.0a1

This report also contains technical information about the state of the application when it crashed.



Expected results:

It should have started sandboxed.

Windows 7 x64
Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
8 GB Memory

Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; Win64; x64; rv:11.0a1) Gecko/20111219 Firefox/11.0a1 ID:20111219031209
